name: Tangrams
discri: A timeless puzzle game consisting of seven flat pieces called tans, which players arrange to form various shapes and figures. The objective is to recreate a specific shape using all seven pieces without overlapping them. It's great for enhancing spatial awareness, creativity, and problem-solving skills, making it perfect for all ages and settings.
maxTime: This exciting kids party will give your child a birthday of memories and funpicnic games for just
